meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 1. above; over; up 飛行機は山の上を飛んだ。The plane flew over the mountain.
2. top; summit; upper part; head (e.g. of a staircase) 本棚の上に手が届きますか。Can you reach to the top of the bookshelf?
3. surface; on (top of) 机の上に本があります。There is a book on the desk.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 4. the above (in a piece of writing); earlier part

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 5. superior; better; higher (position, rank, etc.); upper (class) 彼のスキーの腕は私よりはるかに上だ。He is far above me in skiing.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 6. elder; older; senior 彼は私の兄よりも年が上に見えます。He looks older than my brother.
7. with respect to ...; in terms of; as far as ... is concerned; when (e.g. drunk) as ...上で(は) or ...上の彼は仕事の上では私の先輩だ。He has more experience on the job than I.
8. besides ...; in addition to ...; on top of ...; as well as ... as ...上(に)寒かったうえに、風も強かった。It was cold, and, in addition, it was windy.
9. after ...; upon ...; on ...; with (e.g. full awareness); as a result of ... as ...上(で)彼らは合意の上で敏速な行動をとった。They acted immediately by agreement.
10. since ...; now that ...; because ... as ...上は
11. honorable; venerable; dear Honorific or respectful (sonkeigo) language, See also 父上, after a person of higher status
12. emperor; sovereign; shogun; daimyo Archaic
1. from the standpoint of; from the viewpoint of; with respect to; in terms of; as a matter of; in view of; so far as ... is concerned 彼は経済上の理由で計画を断念した。He gave up the plan for economic reasons.
2. on; above; on top of; aboard (a ship or vehicle) 地図上の青い線は川に相当する。The blue lines on the map correspond to rivers.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 3. the best; top; first class; first grade
4. first volume (of a two or three-volume set); first book See also 下, See also 中
5. with my compliments written on a gift's wrapping paper
1. upper reaches (of a river); upper stream Antonym: 下 しも
2. top; upper part; upper half (of the body)
3. long ago
4. beginning; first
5. person of high rank (e.g. the emperor) Honorific or respectful (sonkeigo) language, See also 御上
6. government; imperial court
7. imperial capital (i.e. Kyoto); capital region (i.e. Kansai); region (or direction of) the imperial palace See also 上方 かみがた
8. head (of a table)
9. wife; mistress (of a restaurant) Honorific or respectful (sonkeigo) language
1. upper; upward; outer; surface; top
2. Uwa

meanings.meaning: 1. above; over; up 飛行機は山の上を飛んだ。The plane flew over the mountain.
2. top; summit; upper part; head (e.g. of a staircase) 本棚の上に手が届きますか。Can you reach to the top of the bookshelf?
3. surface; on (top of) 机の上に本があります。There is a book on the desk.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 4. the above (in a piece of writing); earlier part

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 5. superior; better; higher (position, rank, etc.); upper (class) 彼のスキーの腕は私よりはるかに上だ。He is far above me in skiing.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 6. elder; older; senior 彼は私の兄よりも年が上に見えます。He looks older than my brother.
7. with respect to ...; in terms of; as far as ... is concerned; when (e.g. drunk) as ...上で(は) or ...上の彼は仕事の上では私の先輩だ。He has more experience on the job than I.
8. besides ...; in addition to ...; on top of ...; as well as ... as ...上(に)寒かったうえに、風も強かった。It was cold, and, in addition, it was windy.
9. after ...; upon ...; on ...; with (e.g. full awareness); as a result of ... as ...上(で)彼らは合意の上で敏速な行動をとった。They acted immediately by agreement.
10. since ...; now that ...; because ... as ...上は

sentences.translation: The plane flew over the mountain.
Can you reach to the top of the bookshelf?
There is a book on the desk.
He is far above me in skiing.
He looks older than my brother.
He has more experience on the job than I.
It was cold, and, in addition, it was windy.
They acted immediately by agreement.

meanings.meaning: 1. to raise; to elevate See also 手を挙げる質問があれば右手を挙げて下さい。If you have a question, please raise your right hand.
2. to do up (one's hair) See also 髪を上げる髪も上げたほうが私は好きだ。I also prefer it with the hair worn up.
3. to fly (a kite, etc.); to launch (fireworks, etc.); to surface (a submarine, etc.) 花火が四方八方であげられた。The fireworks were set off on all sides.
4. to land (a boat) 彼らはその船を岸にあげた。They drew the boat on the beach.
5. to deep-fry Only applies to 揚げるこの鶏肉はよく揚げられている。This chicken is fried well.
6. to show someone (into a room)
7. to give Polite (teineigo) language, Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 上げるあなたは時には妹さんにおこづかいをあげますか。Do you sometimes give your sister money?
8. to send someone (away)
9. to enrol (one's child in school); to enroll
10. to increase (price, quality, status, etc.); to develop (talent, skill); to improve その店は値段を全部上げた。The store raised all the prices.
11. to make (a loud sound); to raise (one's voice) See also 声を上げる彼は悲鳴をあげて逃げて行った。He cried out and ran away.
12. to earn (something desirable) 彼は立派な成績を上げた。He got wonderful results.
13. to praise
14. to give (an example, etc.); to cite usu. 挙げる記者：例を１つあげてくださいますか。Reporter: Can you give me an example?
15. to summon up (all of one's energy, etc.) usu. 挙げる全力をあげてたたかえ。Fight with all your might.
16. to arrest Only applies to 挙げる
17. to nominate Only applies to 挙げる私は考えられる候補者としてポールの名を挙げた。I put Paul's name forward as a possible candidate.
18. to summon (for geishas, etc.) Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 揚げる
19. to offer up (incense, a prayer, etc.) to the gods (or Buddha, etc.) Only applies to 上げる
20. to bear (a child)
21. to conduct (a ceremony, esp. a wedding) usu. 挙げる私は先月結婚式を挙げました。I held a wedding ceremony last month.
22. (of the tide) to come in

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 23. to vomit
24. to do for (the sake of someone else) Usually written using kana alone, Polite (teineigo) language, after the -te form of a verb解き方を教えてあげるよ。I will show you how to solve it.
25. to complete ... See also 作り上げる, after the -masu stem of a verb
26. to humbly do ... Humble (kenjougo) language, See also 申し上げる, after the -masu stem of a humble verb to increase the level of humility
27. Deep frying Deep frying is a cooking method in which food is submerge... Read more

13. to praise
14. to give (an example, etc.); to cite usu. 挙げる記者：例を１つあげてくださいますか。Reporter: Can you give me an example?
15. to summon up (all of one's energy, etc.) usu. 挙げる全力をあげてたたかえ。Fight with all your might.
16. to arrest Only applies to 挙げる
17. to nominate Only applies to 挙げる私は考えられる候補者としてポールの名を挙げた。I put Paul's name forward as a possible candidate.
18. to summon (for geishas, etc.) Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 揚げる
19. to offer up (incense, a prayer, etc.) to the gods (or Buddha, etc.) Only applies to 上げる
20. to bear (a child)
21. to conduct (a ceremony, esp. a wedding) usu. 挙げる私は先月結婚式を挙げました。I held a wedding ceremony last month.
22. (of the tide) to come in

sentences.translation: If you have a question, please raise your right hand.
I also prefer it with the hair worn up.
The fireworks were set off on all sides.
They drew the boat on the beach.
This chicken is fried well.
Do you sometimes give your sister money?
The store raised all the prices.
He cried out and ran away.
He got wonderful results.
Reporter: Can you give me an example?
Fight with all your might.
I put Paul's name forward as a possible candidate.
I held a wedding ceremony last month.
I will show you how to solve it.

meanings.meaning: 1. skillful; skilled; proficient; good (at); adept; clever Antonym: 下手 へたあなたは上手にバスケットボールができますか。Do you play basketball well?
2. flattery
上手 【じょうて】、上手 【じょうしゅ】
じょうて: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage. じょうしゅ: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.
1. skillful; skilled; proficient; good (at); adept; clever Antonym: 下手 へたあなたは上手にバスケットボールができますか。Do you play basketball well?
2. flattery
上手 【じょうて】、上手 【じょうしゅ】
じょうて: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage. じょうしゅ: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.

sentences.translation: Do you play basketball well?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to ascend; to go up; to climb Only applies to 上る, Only applies to 登るあなたは、上れませんよ。You cannot climb!

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to ascend (as a natural process, e.g. the Sun); to rise Only applies to 上る, Only applies to 昇るそのとき太陽がのぼるところだった。The sun was coming up then.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to go to (the capital) Only applies to 上る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to be promoted Only applies to 昇る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to add up to Only applies to 上る損失は１００万ドル以上にのぼる。The loss adds up to more than one million dollars.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to advance (in price) Only applies to 上る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to swim up (a river); to sail up Only applies to 上る彼らは川を舟をこいで上った。They rowed up the river.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to come up (on the agenda) Only applies to 上る議題に上っている項目の議論を続けましょう。Let's proceed with the items on the agenda.
登る 【のぼる】、昇る 【のぼる】

meanings.meaning: 1. to ascend; to go up; to climb Only applies to 上る, Only applies to 登るあなたは、上れませんよ。You cannot climb!

The sun was coming up then.
The loss adds up to more than one million dollars.
They rowed up the river.

meanings.meaning: 1. coat; jacket; outerwear
2. top; upper-body garment
上衣 【うわぎ】、表着 【うわぎ】、上衣 【じょうい】
表着: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. coat; jacket; outerwear
2. top; upper-body garment
上衣 【うわぎ】、表着 【うわぎ】、上衣 【じょうい】
表着: Rarely-used kanji form.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to rise; to go up; to come up; to ascend; to be raised Antonym: 下がる３月１日から鉄道運賃が１割あがると発表された。It has been announced that railway fares will be raised by 10 percent starting on the first of March.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to enter (esp. from outdoors); to come in; to go in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to enter (a school); to advance to the next grade

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to get out (of water); to come ashore 軽くひと泳ぎした僕は、水から上がってプールサイドに腰を下ろす。After a light swim, I came up from the water and sat down on the poolside.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to increase also written as 騰る in ref. to price来月タクシー料金があがります。Taxi fares will go up next month.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to improve; to make progress

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to be promoted; to advance

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to be made (of profit, etc.) ここからあがる所得は無税である。The income from this source is tax-free.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to occur (esp. of a favourable result)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to be adequate (to cover expenses, etc.) often as 〜で上がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to be finished; to be done; to be over 「要さんって、何時にあがれます？」「終わりまでだから八時までかかるわ」"Kaname, when can you leave?" "It's till closing so it takes till eight."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to stop (of rain); to lift 「雨がすぐあがるでしょうか」「あがらないと思うよ」"Will it stop raining soon?" "I'm afraid not."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to stop (working properly); to cut out; to give out; to die 翌日、またバッテリーが上がってる。The next day the battery was flat again.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to win (in a card game, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to be arrested Only applies to 挙がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. to turn up (of evidence, etc.) Only applies to 挙がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to be deep fried Only applies to 揚がる恵一、天ぷら揚がったから、皿持って来い。Keiichi, the tempura's done, so bring a plate.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 18. to be spoken loudly 政府が今国会への改正案提出の見送り方針を固めたことを歓迎する一方、小泉首相が提出断念を明言していない点を警戒する声も上がった。While welcoming the firming up of the present government policy to abandon the proposal of the reform bill to the Diet, at the same time some are worried that Prime Minister Koizumi won't clearly state the bill's withdrawal.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 19. to get nervous; to get stage fright esp. アガる私は演説をすると決まってあがる。I never make a speech without being nervous.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 20. to be offered (to the gods, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 21. to go; to visit Humble (kenjougo) language明日それをいただきに上がります。I will call for it tomorrow.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 22. to eat; to drink Honorific or respectful (sonkeigo) language

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 23. to be listed (as a candidate) esp. 挙がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 24. to serve (in one's master's home)
25. to be complete; to finish See also 出来上がる, after the -masu stem of a verb
26. above; north of as ～上ル; in the Kyoto address system
揚がる 【あがる】、挙がる 【あがる】、上る 【あがる】
上る: Irregular okurigana usage.

meanings.meaning: 1. skillful; skilful; skilled; good; expert; clever (expression, trick, etc.); apt; appropriate Usually written using kana alone, esp. 上手い, 巧い彼女はテニスは上手いが、水泳は下手だ。She's very good at tennis, but she's not much of a swimmer.

2. delicious; tasty; good; nice Usually written using kana alone, esp. 旨い, 美味い, 甘いあそこの食べ物はうまいし値段も安いが、地の利が悪いのが難点だね。That place's food is great, and their prices are good, but the fly in the ointment is their terrible location.
3. good (deal, idea, etc.); profitable; promising; lucky; fortunate; successful; satisfactory; splendid Usually written using kana alone, esp. 旨いそれはあまりにもうますぎる話だ。That's too good a story to be true.
美味い 【うまい】、旨い 【うまい】、巧い 【うまい】、甘い 【うまい】、美い 【うまい】
美い: Rarely-used kanji form.

1. skillful; skilful; skilled; good; expert; clever (expression, trick, etc.); apt; appropriate Usually written using kana alone, esp. 上手い, 巧い彼女はテニスは上手いが、水泳は下手だ。She's very good at tennis, but she's not much of a swimmer.

2. delicious; tasty; good; nice Usually written using kana alone, esp. 旨い, 美味い, 甘いあそこの食べ物はうまいし値段も安いが、地の利が悪いのが難点だね。That place's food is great, and their prices are good, but the fly in the ointment is their terrible location.
3. good (deal, idea, etc.); profitable; promising; lucky; fortunate; successful; satisfactory; splendid Usually written using kana alone, esp. 旨いそれはあまりにもうますぎる話だ。That's too good a story to be true.
美味い 【うまい】、旨い 【うまい】、巧い 【うまい】、甘い 【うまい】、美い 【うまい】
美い: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: She's very good at tennis, but she's not much of a swimmer.
That place's food is great, and their prices are good, but the fly in the ointment is their terrible location.
That's too good a story to be true.

1. not less than ...; ... and over; ... and above; ... and upwards; ... or more Antonym: 以下６歳以上の子供は学校に通わなければならない。Children of six and above should attend school.
2. beyond (e.g. one's expectations); above; more than; further than 必要以上にお金を使わないようにしなさい。Try not to spend more money than is necessary.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no', Noun
meanings.meaning: 3. the above; the above-mentioned; the aforementioned; the foregoing 以上のように、実にシンプルな誰でも出来るノウハウで十分な利益と顧客は確保できるのです！As shown above, it is possible to obtain ample profit and customers with truly simple know-how that anyone can do!

4. since ...; seeing that ...; now that ...; once ... after a verb公僕も人間であること、また、人間である以上過ちを犯す可能性があることを、彼は認識している。He realizes that public officials are human, and that as human beings they are capable of misjudgement.
5. that's all; that is the end; the end 以上ですか？Is that all?
已上 【いじょう】
已上: Rarely-used kanji form.

立上がる 【たちあがる】、起ち上がる 【たちあがる】、立ちあがる 【たちあがる】
1. to pick up 彼女はガラスの花瓶を取り上げた。She picked up one of the glass vases.
2. to adopt (a proposal); to take up (a topic); to accept; to listen to sometimes written as 採り上げるこのブログは情報インフラを中心としたトピックを取り上げています。This blog covers topics that centre on information infrastructure.
3. to take issue with; to make a problem of; to bring up (as a point of criticism)
4. to report (news); to cover; to feature 全新聞がその事件を大きく取り上げた。All the papers featured the case.
5. to take away; to confiscate; to deprive (someone) of; to revoke; to disqualify; to cancel 向こう見ずな運転の為彼は免許を取り上げられた。He had his license taken away because of reckless driving.
6. to deliver (a baby)
7. to collect (taxes)

sentences.translation: She picked up one of the glass vases.
This blog covers topics that centre on information infrastructure.
All the papers featured the case.
He had his license taken away because of reckless driving.
